mapper.select: select count(*) from ( select gifticon_id, pymt_prc, deal_dt, user_id, id from deal_detail where user_id = #{userId} ) dealT, gifticon gftT, product prdT, brand brdT, ( select * from cmmn_code where code_type = 'GFT_STUS' ) stusT where dealT.gifticon_id = gftT.id and gftT.prod_code = prdT.code and prdT.brd_code = brdT.code and gftT.gft_stus_code = stusT.code

select brdT.name brdName, prdT.name prdName, prdT.img_path prdImgPath, prdT.code prdCode, gftT.id gftId, gftT.img_path gftImgPath, gftT.brcd brcd, dealT.user_id csId, dealT.deal_dt dealDt, gftT.expir_dt exprDt, dealT.pymt_prc pymtPrc, stusT.code_name stusCode from product prdT, brand brdT, (select * from cmmn_code where code_type = 'GFT_STUS') stusT, (select * from deal_detail where user_id = #{userId}) dealT, (select * from gifticon where id = #{gftId}) gftT where brdT.code = substr(gftT.prod_code, 1, 4) and prdT.code = gftT.prod_code and stusT.code = gftT.gft_stus_code and dealT.gifticon_id = gftT.id

select dealT.id dealId, dealT.gifticon_id gftId, prdT.code prdCode, dealT.user_id csId, brdT.name brdName, prdT.name prdName, prdT.img_path prdImgPath, dealT.pymt_prc pymtPrc, stusT.code_name stusCode, dealT.deal_dt dealDt, gftT.expir_dt exprDt from ( select gifticon_id, pymt_prc, deal_dt, user_id, id from deal_detail where user_id = #{userId} ) dealT, gifticon gftT, product prdT, brand brdT, ( select * from cmmn_code where code_type = 'GFT_STUS' ) stusT where dealT.gifticon_id = gftT.id and gftT.prod_code = prdT.code and prdT.brd_code = brdT.code and gftT.gft_stus_code = stusT.code
limit #{amount} offset ${(pageNum-1) * amount};
mapper.insert: insert into deal_detail(user_id, gifticon_id, pymt_prc, pymt_mtd, deal_dt, cmpl_dt, in_date, in_user, up_date, up_user) values (#{userId}, #{gftId}, #{dcPrc}, #{metdStus}, current_date(), current_date+3, now(), current_user (), now(), current_user ())
